challenge.title: Gabriel Kuhn - Straight Edge and Radical Sobriety
challenge.description: Gabriel Kuhn's Straight Edge and Radical Sobriety is an introduction to straight edge culture with an emphasis on women's and minorities' experiences.
challenge.instructions: Use Archive.org E-Reserves to read Gabriel Kuhn's Straight Edge and Radical Sobriety.
